title: Customer Support specialist
skills:
- Analytical mind;
- Languages: English - spoken, Russian - native.
- Advanced PC user (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, 1C, Jira, Miro, MS Visio, Draw.io).
- Grammatically correct speech.
- Personal qualities: hardworking, responsible, punctual, sociable, able to work in a team.

primary.name: Lobachevsky State University of Nizhny Novgorod
Lobachevsky State University of Nizhny Novgorod

experience.description:
- Revenue and Cost forecast preparation on a monthly basis.
- Setting up and leading meetings with management in order to present the result of the forecast.
- Analyzing variances between fact and forecast.
- Analyzing Projects activities and KPIs in order to discover any issues and find out the resolution.
- Confirmation of purchases necessary for the projects.
- Communication with different departments (Sales, Delivery, PMO) regarding Project statuses.

industries.name: Системная интеграция,  автоматизации технологических и бизнес-процессов предприятия, ИТ-консалтинг
